name: Magnetic Joe
description: Take control of Magnetic Joe, everyone's favorite little magnetic sphere. Guide him through 100 exciting mazes full of spikes, enemies, and other obstacles. Help Joe as he pursues his nemesis, Dr. Magnevil, who is on his way to conquer the world. The mazes are full of magnets that push and pull Joe in different directions. Your task is to skillfully use their magnetic force to get Joe to the exit unharmed. Use the magnetic force carefully, the levels are filled with surprises and a boss could be lurking!
